creator: wdagang@yahoo.com.cn
text:
one day after the server run,the mod_jk can not get the right request,check the server,apache is ok,tomcat is ok,but the mode_jk report the next error info:

plese help,thanks.

You are out of memory on your system. The malloc() function was not able to allocate more memory. Check your system memory.

Please proceed discussing on the users list and reopen this issue only after you found evidence, that the reason is actually a mod_jk bug.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
